maqras.text: Uss jannat ki sift jiss ka wada perhezgaron ko diya gaya hai yeh hai kay uss key neechay nehren beh rahi hain. Uss ka mewa hameshgi wala hai aur uss ka saya bhi. Yeh hai anjam perhezgaron ka aur kafiron ka anjam kaar dozakh hai

Jinhen hum ney kitab di hai woh to jo kuch aap per utara jata hai uss say khush hotay hain aur doosray fiqay iss ki baaz baaton say munkir hain. Aap ailaan ker dijiye kay mujhay to sirf yehi hukum diya gaya hai kay mein Allah ki ibadat keroon aur uss kay sath shareek na keroon mein ussi ki taraf bula raha hun aur ussi ki janib mera lotna hai

Issi tarah hum ney iss quran ko arabi zaban ka farman utara hai. Agar app ney inn ki khuwaishon ki pairwi kerli iss kay baad kay aap kay pass ilm aa chuka hai to Allah (kay azabon) say aap ko koi himayati milay ga aur na bachaney wala

Hum aap say pehlay bhi boht say rasool bhej chukay hain aur hum ney unn sab ko biwi bachon wala banaya tha kissi rasool say nahi hosakta kay koi nishani baghair Allah ki ijazat kay ley aaye her muqarrara waday ki aik likhat hai
Allah jo chahaye mita dey aur jo chahaye sabit rakhay loh-e-mehfooz ussi kay pass hai
Inn say kiye huye wadon mein say koi agar hum aap ko dikha den ya aap ko hum fot ker len to aap per to sirf phoncha dena hi hai. Hisab to humaray zimmay hi hai
Kiya woh nahi dekhtay? Kay hum zamin ko iss kay kinaron say ghatatay chalay aarahey hain Allah hukum kerta hai koi uss kay ehkaam peechay dalney wala nahi woh jald hisab leney wala hai

Inn say pehlay logon ney bhi apni makkari mein kami na ki thi lekin tamam tadbeeren Allah hi ki hain jo shaks jo kuch ker raha hai Allah kay ilm mein hai. Kafiron ko abhi maloom hojaye ga kay (uss) jahaan ki saza kiss kay liye hai
Yeh kafir kehtay hain kay aap Allah kay rasool nahi. Aap jawab dijiye kay mujh mein aur tum mein Allah gawahi denay wala kafi hai aur woh jiss kay pass kitab ka ilm hai
Alif-laam-raa! Yeh aali shaan kitab hum ney aap ki taraf utari hai kay aap logon ko andheron say ujalay ki taraf layen inn kay perwerdigar kay hukum say zabardast aur tareefon walay Allah ki taraf
Jiss Allah ka hai jo kuch aamano aur zamin mein hai.aur kafiron kay liye to sakht azab ki kharabi hai
Jo aakhirat kay muqablay mein dunyawi zindagi ko pasand rakhtay hain aur Allah ki raah say roktay hain aur iss mein terh pann peda kerna chahatay hain. Yehi log parli darjay ki gumrahi mein hain

Hum ney her her nabi ko uss ki qomi zaban mein hi bheja hai takay unn kay samney wazahat say biyan ker dey. Abb Allah Taalaa jisay chahaye gumrah ker dey aur jisay chahaye raah dikha dey woh ghalba aur hikmat wala hai

(yaad rakho jabkay) hum ney musa ko apni nishaniyan dey ker bheja kay tu apni qom ko andheron say roshni mein nikal aur enhen Allah kay ehsanaat yaad dila. Iss mein nishaniyan hain her aik sabar shukar kerney wlay kay liye

Jiss waqt musa ney apni qom say kaha kay Allah kay woh ehsanaat yaad kero jo uss ney tum per kiye hain jabkay uss ney tumhen firaoniyon say nijat di jo tumhen baray dukh phonchatay thay. Tumharay larkon ko qatal kertay thay aut tumhari larkiyon ko zinda chortay thay iss mein tumharay rab ki taraf say tum per boht bari aamaeesh thi
Aur jab tumharay perwerdigar ney tumhen aagah kerdiya kay agar tum shukar guzari kero gay to be-shak mein tumhen ziyada doon ga aur agar tum na shukri kero gay to yaqeenan mera azab boht sakht hai
Musa (alh-e-salam) ney kaha kay agar tum sab aur ruy-e-zamin kay tamam insan Allah ki na shukri keren to bhi Allah bey niyaz aur tareefon wala hai

Kiya tumharay pass tum say pehlay kay logon ki khabren nahi aaen? Yani qom-e-nooh ki aur aad-o-samood ki aur unn kay baad walon ki jinhen siwaye Allah Taalaa kay aur koi nahi janta unn kay pass unn kay rasool moajzzay laye lekin unhon ney apney hath apney mun mein daba liye aur saaf keh diya kay jo kuch tumhen dey ker bheja gaya hai hum uss kay munkir hain aur jiss cheez ki taraf tum humen bula rahey ho humen to iss mein bara bhari shuba hai
